body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear with WiFi, 1080P FHD Dash Camera for Cars, Dual Dashcam with 3 Inch Display, Super Night Vision, 170° Wide Angle, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, Parking Monitor, Support 128GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 11 mins
features: 3" LCD 1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear: This dual dash cam equipped with 1920x1080P resolution front camera and waterproof rear camera, which clearly capture license plates and road signs for providing double protection for your safety. 3" super large LCD display screen can show the real-time image, help you see every details as clear as possible when playing back.

Built-in WIFI & APP Control: For more convenient use, you can use the "52HZ" APP, and then connect your mobile phone to the built-in WIFI of the dash cam to view, download and share the recorded video in real time to your friends and families, you also can set the dash camera on your mobile phone.

Super Night Vision & Wide Angle: This dash camera for cars has a large aperture of F1.8 and 6-glass lens, WDR technology automatically recognizes day and black, ensuring image clarity even at night, capturing license plates. Wide angle front (170°) and rear（140°）camera help reduces the blind spots and captures more details.

Loop Recording & Emergency Accident Locks: The loop recording function makes the newly recorded video will overwrite the oldest video when SD card is full. And the dashcams for cars has highly-sensitive G-sensor. When a collision occurs, The Gravity Sensing will emergency lock and protect the current video file to prevent overwriting by loop recording, saving important evidences to help you away from disputes.

Warranty & Customer Service: Our products comes with 1-year warranty. Please read the manual carefully, any problem in using the products, please reach out to our 24/7 technical support will be happy to help you out at any time.

24H Parking Monitor: This car cam can protect your property when parking, and will auto record video when detects unusual vibration, then locks it and saves it. Please note that this function would not work on if you not use a hardwire kit (not included).

Easy Installation & Use: Complete accessories to meet the needs of various models. You can freely install the dash cam of the right size on the front car glass without obstructing the view of the front car. The dashcams support 128GB max (not included).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HURRA dash cam team independently develops top-notch products, continuously improves product performance according to market and customer feedback. We are aimed at providing powerful, cheap and useful car products for all of our customers, escort your driving.

Features Video Resolution: 1080P+720P Screen: 3" LCD Screen Mounting Option: Suction Cup Loop Recording: OFF / 1 / 3 / 5 minutes G-Sensor: OFF / Low / Medium / High Micro SD Card: Support max 128GB Class10 Micro SD card(not included) Working Temperature: -4°F to 158°F

Built-in WiFi and APP Control The dash cam Built-in WiFi, you can easily connect to your smartphone, play and download videos on the APP, and share your journey with friends and family on social media. You can also easily operate and set the driving recorder on the APP, making your travel easier.

Dual Dash Cam with Wide Angle View The smart dash camera for Cars adopts full HD 1080P/720P, front 170° and rear 140° ultra-wide-angle dual lenses, 5-lane full field of view, eliminating blind spots of sight, and escorting your safe driving. The screen has three display modes: picture-in-picture, only front-camera, and only rear-camera.

package including 1 x Front Dash Camera 1x Reversing Camera 1 x Suction Mount 1 x Adhesive Mount 1 x Car Charger 1 x USB Power Cable 1 x User Manual 1 x Cable Clips Rear Dash Cam The waterproof rear camera of the dual dash cam avoids the impact of rainy days or humid environment on the video quality of the machine. Upgraded Super Capacitor The upgraded super capacitors can withstand extreme temperatures from -4°F to 158°F, avoiding the risk of overheating, explosion and melting compared to traditional lithium batteries, extending the life of your dash cam while giving you For a safer and more comfortable experience.

FAQ: 1. Q: Some dash cam have a battery. Yours does not say if it does or not, what is the battery function? A: Our dash cam has a battery, and the power of the battery is 0.666WH, which is used for time counting and shutdown to save video. If there is no battery, the time of the machine will be restored to the default time during production every time it is powered on, such as January 1, 2022; at the same time, if there is no battery protection, the last video after the car is turned off will remain off due to no battery, the damaged file will be unviewable. 2. Q: I bought the dash cam need to know how to download the app i scanned the qr code and does not download the app? A: If you are using an iPhone, please download the "HonourRobot" APP in the Apple Store, please note: there are two APPs in the store, you need to download the second one; after the download is successful, turn on the driving recorder, connect the charger, After the driving recorder is turned on, the WiFi function is turned on by default. If the WIFI function in the upper right corner of the screen is not turned on, please enter the menu bar to find the WIFI icon, click connect, and wait for two seconds. A good APP connects to the driving recorder. If you are using an Android phone, please find the "i" icon in the menu bar of the screen, press the OK button and the QR code will pop up, scan the QR code and download it according to the process, then you can connect to the driving recorder. 3. Q: Whether the screen can display the front and back images at the same time? A: Yes. Based on your driving habits, you can freely choose the screen display mode: 1> Front camera display only 2> Backup dashcam display only 3> Front + Rear camera display (right corner) 4> Front + Rear camera display (1:1)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Being generous with my rating see details
reviews.reviewText: Foe the price the camera is good. My only issue at the moment is the really small and cheap plastic piece thar holds the camera to the mount. It's literally about 1/8th inch square and locks into a slot loosely. The camera was easy to set up and install in my Jeep Sahara 4 door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made - Defective - UPDATED JAN 2023
reviews.reviewText: On the camera I received, the SD slot is very mis-aligned with the case, so when I put the SD card in, it just vanished inside the camera and is rattling around. There is no way to open the camera to get the SD card back out. The "App" that comes with is not in the Google Play store and Android flagged it as a potentially harmful application. This was a Christmas present, and I regret buying this.UPDATE AS OF JAN 12, 2023 - The Seller sent me a new camera quickly which worked as designed. I ended up breaking open the old one to get my SD card out, rendering it useless. On the new camera, the picture is clear, the menu items make sense and is fairly intuitive. Other rear-cams get power from the main camera, but this one requires to tap into an existing wire. In my car, it's actually a bundle of wires, so it took a bit to find the right one. It did make me nervous to pierce a wire, but it worked. I took the SD card out and view on a computer and the image quality, even at night is pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Back camera quit working
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had it a year yet, and the rear camera has quit working. Tried checking everything, wire is good camear looks to be undamaged, it was working just fine one second, then just stopped the next. Caused the front camera to keep going on and off until I unplugged the rear camera front camera still works though. Also can't get a replacement rear camera or wire. So it is useless now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and seller service.
reviews.reviewText: First of all, my car is relatively large, and the other dash cam wire were relatively short before, but the wire of the rear camera of this dash cam is enough to meet my needs, and then in addition to the suction cup, the seller also provided a adhesive mount for installation, You can switch between two different installation methods, the quality of the front and rear cameras work well in day and night, it is very clear when I watch the playback. I am very satisfied with this good quality and cheap dash cam. And the seller can solve your questions well and quickly. I recommend it to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not record the rear view
reviews.reviewText: Cameron’s great qualities great kind of misleading it doesn’t record the rearview picture it’s just a back up camera only records what’s in front of you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Everything is fine.for two days, then it stopped recording. but the light is still blinking. I took out the memory card to see. then it only records a few files and then reports a bad card. it damaged my memory card. I returned. Then I got in touch with them, Explain the camera have problem. And They sent me another one to try again. And results as expected in two weeks. There seems to be no problem. And now I can refund all the money back to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The CAMERA App IS NOT AVAILABLE in the USA??
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are very vague and found the app QR code by going through the camera by chance. It should be be available in the instruction pamphlet. I even inquired this to the vendor to what app I need to download and received no answer. And now the window to return is closed. And the parking sensor isn't very sensitive. I have not picked up any detection motion unless I literally wave my hand in front of the camera. I would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great dash cam fot the price
reviews.reviewText: The only thing why only 4 stars is the written instructions not very good, you need to do a bit research for replay the video clips on your PC, no WIFI or GPS is no issue for me, it does what I need it for.Records the rear camera as well,Easy installation and setup. I had a $120 dollar ones before and was not happy and returned it, you wont find anything better for this price.So far so good.
